markdown:
These aggressive serpents infest bogs and lowlands. Despite a length of over 16 feet and weighing over 200 pounds, they can climb trees in seconds. An emperor cobra wards off predators by flaring its hood and hissing at its attacker. **[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15 [Emperor Cobra](/Monsters.aspx?ID=808) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 245 2.0 **Perception** +13; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11 **Str** +6 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** -4 **Wis** +2 **Cha** -2 --- **AC** 22 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +11 **Will** +9 **HP** 80 --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet, swim 25 feet **Melee** fangs +15 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus emperor cobra venom **Emperor Cobra Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 22 Fortitude, **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d8 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d8 poison damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage and drained 2 (1 round) **Flare Hood** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The emperor cobra flares its hood. Each non–emperor cobra creature within a 20-foot emanation must attempt a DC 22 Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).
**Failure** The creature is frightened 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature is frightened 3.
name: Emperor Cobra

An emperor cobra wards off predators by flaring its hood and hissing at its attacker. Each non–emperor cobra creature within a 20-foot emanation must attempt a DC 22 Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute. Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
